channel.title: Videos on Everyone Program: A free, self-paced, coached introduction to computer programming for people who know nothing about it.
channel.description: Recent content in Videos on Everyone Program: A free, self-paced, coached introduction to computer programming for people who know nothing about it.

item.title: Videos
item.description:
Many people find the tutorials by themselves work fine. However, some folks prefer starting with video lectures before tackling the tutorial exercises.

We’ve found the free Socratica series of lectures to be straightforward and useful. They follow a similar (not exact) order as the tutorials.

The code examples in these videos generally use large enough fonts that you can even watch them on your phone, if you have young eyes.

Note that the Socratica videos seem to have a science-fiction theme in their artwork, and the speaker gives the impression that she might be an android. This, however, gives her an excuse for speaking very clearly and precisely.
